# ðŸ“‰ Sub-Issue: Comparative Analytics & Benchmarking

## Goal
Provide users with period-over-period comparisons, peer benchmarking, goal setting, and cohort analysis to drive actionable insights.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement backend logic for period comparison and benchmarking
- [ ] Build frontend comparative metrics cards and goal tracking UI
- [ ] Integrate cohort analysis by graduation year/major
- [ ] Add trend indicators and progress bars
- [ ] Write tests for comparison, benchmarking, and goal tracking

## Acceptance Criteria
- Comparative analytics and benchmarking features work as described in [parent issue](./dashboard-analytics-core.md)
- Users can set and track personal goals
- Cohort analysis and peer comparisons are accurate
